testcase.name: Then I see messages with flags in folder
Given I am on home mail.ru page
When I login with correct data
And I click on folder field
Then I see message about folder field
Scenario: Checking files field
Given I am on home mail.ru page
Then I see that field with icons is displayed
Scenario: Checking presence of icons
When I post message
Then I see message is posted
Scenario: Checking post message
When I post message
And I edit message
Then I see message is edited
Scenario: Checking edit message
When I post message
And I delete post
Then I see post is deleted
Scenario: Checking delete message
